settings.title: Image with text
settings.text: Pair text with an image to give customers insight into your brand. Tell a story, explain a product detail, or describe a new promotion.

settings.title: CARE GUIDE
settings.text: Learn how to care for your pieces

settings.title: Leather Footwear
settings.answer:
Leather is known for its durability, softness, and ability to mold to your foot. To reduce the signs of wear, ensure regular care and cleaning.

How to Care

  • Using a leather cleaner, spot clean with a microfiber cloth
  • Apply a leather conditioner to avoid cracks
  • Avoid water, oils and creams that may stain the finish
  • Store in a dust bag off-season

settings.title: Vegan Leather Footwear
settings.answer:
Made from 100% PU, vegan leather is a great alternative to our classic leather styles—plus, it's pretty low-maintenance.

How to Care

  • Regularly clean with a soft, damp microfiber cloth
  • A mild detergent can be used for stubborn marks
  • Dry off using a microfiber cloth
  • Avoid water, oils and creams that may stain the finish
  • Store in a dust bag off-season

settings.title: Core Clothing
settings.answer:
Made with 100% cotton terry, the key to having your pieces hold their shape and softness is all in how you care for them.

How to Care

  • Machine wash in cold water on a gentle cycle
  • Use a mild detergent and fabric softner
  • Lay flat to dry
  • For added softness, put in the dryer on low
    heat for 5 minutes

settings.title: Core Fleece Clothing
settings.answer:
Made with 80% cotton, 20% polyester blend the key to having your pieces hold their shape and softness is all in how you care for them.

How to Care

  • Machine wash in cold water on a gentle cycle
  • Use a mild detergent and fabric softener
  • Wash with similar colors
  • Lay flat to dry
  • For added softness – dry on low heat for 5 minutes

settings.title: Super Rib
settings.answer:
Body-hugging with just enough stretch, our Super Rib collection is made with sustainable Bamboo Rayon for softness and durability.

How to Care

  • Machine wash in cold water on a gentle cycle
  • Use a mild detergent
  • Wash with similar colors
  • Lay flat to dry
  • Do not iron

settings.title: Gauze
settings.answer:
Made wtih 100% cotton with a soft and breezy feel. Help your pieces keep their shape by treating them with extra care.

  • Machine wash in cold water on a gentle cycle
  • Use a mild detergent
  • Wash with similar colors
  • Tumble dry on low
  • Do not iron
  • Can be dry cleaned
